DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of Hydros-TA Joint Therapy for relief of pain due to OA of the knee. Hydros-TA is designed to provide fast acting and long lasting pain relief for up to six months with a single IA injection.
DOC.brief_title: Hydros and Hydros-TA Joint Therapy for Pain Associated With Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.criteria: Have radiographic evidence within the prior 6 months, as shown in the radiology reports, of OA grade 2 or 3 using KellgrenLawrence Grading for OA. Symptoms in the index knee for at least 12 months. Fully ambulatory Subject (ability to perform a 15 meters walk test). Male and female Subjects 40 through 85 years of age. BMI >40 kg Secondary OA (acute knee injury, rheumatoid arthritis, gout, history of joint infection, osteonecrosis, chronic fibromyalgia) or other chronic autoimmune disease. Intra articular steroid therapy in last 3 months Intra articular viscosupplementation in last 6 months
